snippet: Sandy Koufax, the former pitcher, and Robert M. Morgenthau, chairman of the Police Athletic League, are among those the Mets intend to call to testify.
abstract: Hall of Fame pitcher Sandy Koufax and Police Athletic League chairman Robert M Morgenthau are among those that New York Mets owners want to testify in their legal fight against the trustee for the victims of Bernard L Madoff.
lead_paragraph: Sandy Koufax, the former pitcher, and Robert M. Morgenthau, chairman of the Police Athletic League, are among those the Mets intend to call to testify.

headline.seo: At Trial, Mets Owners Want Koufax; Trustee Doesn’t Want S.E.C.
headline.main: Trial Near, Mets Owners and Trustee Argue Fair and Foul
headline.print_headline: Trial Near, Mets Owners and Trustee Argue Fair and Foul
